name: Brief
author: Andrew Matin

sections.description:
Brief is a WordPress plugin to show dashboard widget with development reports, readme, documentation from developer to client.
The plugin supports markdown format. Developer can also add brand logo and link into report widget by configuration panel.

Features

  1. Changelog in Markdown format
  2. Readme in Markdown format
  3. Brand Logo/Link
  4. Enable/Disable dashboard widget

Privacy notices

This plugin does not:

  • track users by stealth;
  • write any user personal data to the database;
  • send any data to external servers;
  • use cookies.

Vendor JavaScript Libraries

  • jQuery Library jQuery
  • JavaScript converter Markdown to HTML showdown.js

How to use

  1. After installation please visit ‘Admin area’ – ‘Settings’ – ‘Brief’
  2. Check ‘Enable’ on the ‘Brief’ page
  3. Optionally add Brand logo and fill Developer Profile URL
  4. Update Changelog textarea in Markdown format
  5. Update Readme teaxtarea in Markdown format by technical documentation

Changes will appear at ‘Dashboard’ area ‘Brief’ widget
sections.installation:
1. Upload brief to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
